## Hazard and survival functions

Suppose we have a [probability density function](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Probability_density_function) $f(t)$ with [cumulative density function](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cumulative_distribution_function) $F(t)$, the [hazard function](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Failure_rate#Hazard_rate) is

$$
h(t) = \frac{f(t)}{1-F(t)}
$$

[Survival function](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Survival_function)

$$
S(t) = 1 - F(t)
$$
